reviewText: Fascinating story of very brave people willing to stand up to evil.
This move is well done and shows how many in the military struggled with Hitler and his confused and dangerous ideas.
I was also screwed by this... i really wish i had read the reviews before ordering this. :sighs: don't make the same mistake others of us have made, and order the two movies separately.

I ordered the two pack with the older version (which was the one I really wanted) and the newer TC version, and I only got the modern version.
Even your picture that comes with this review indicates I ordered the two pack.

Well I had kind of a bad experience with ordering this set. Have tried two different times to get this set and have had no luck of getting it. I'm a huge history buff and love anything on world war 2. From a fan of history I want to get the old Valkyrie movie and also would like to see the documentary on Hunting Hitler. Some day I will find the set or find them separately. At this point it would be nice to buy the two movies as a set because they are cheaper that way. Any how try and see if you can get the set, at this point I've tried twice and have not succeeded. Good luck and God Bless you.

the version of valkyrie is superior to the Cruise flick!
and hunting hitler is a great history channel documentary.
you can't go wrong with these two and i have a lot of
nazi ss movies and documentaries and these are two of best.
